para.text: You have the option of positioning so-called "magnetic lines" on the drawing. These can be helpful when creating the drawings. Magnetic lines are purely construction aids and are neither printed out, nor can they be edited in any way. You can create, move and delete these lines. The advantage of these lines is that they "magnetically attract" all elements. As soon as you move an element and with it come close to such a magnetic line, it will be attracted to it. This can be used to align several elements on exactly one line, for example. With several such lines, table-like structures could also be designed.
